title: U.S., Russian Aircraft Flew Perilously Close to Each Other Amid Ukraine Tensions
sub_head: Pentagon says it expressed concern to Russian officials through diplomatic channels
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”U.S. and Russian military aircraft flew dangerously close to each other in three separate weekend incidents over the Mediterranean Sea, including one in which the planes passed within 5 feet, Pentagon officials said Wednesday.
The incidents, which occurred in international airspace Friday and Saturday, involved Russian Su-35 jet fighters crossing into the flight paths of U.S. Navy P-8A surveillance aircraft, the officials said.
